Text:
WARNING! This is truly gruesome. I object to the title! This could just as easily be Taliban cutting the heads off Afghans, or one tribe against another. Whoever is doing this they betray humanity and should be judged. This is not what I want to see. It shames us all that we can be so base as to stand by and film this shit without reacting, but being instead locked in shock and fear!
My country and faith is peace and love. stop this ugliness, it won't help you.
sorry for the wobbly.
